143.title: Lara Croft: Tomb Raider

1431.content:
(Based on the 2013 Tomb Raider)

Lara follows the long trail up to what looks to be a small tomb opening. She pulls out a knife from her boot and cuts down the surrounding branches and bushes. Lara smiles as she sees a small concrete pillar blocking the door with a small symbol on it. She smirks and pulls out her map, the map has an identical logo on it what in the shape of a small eagle. It had only taken her a couple of days but she had finally found it.

Lara reaches out wiping some dust around the logo to reveal a few smaller logos and patters, she hums and looks back down at the map seeing the same patterns on her map. She glances up at the pillar then back down at the map.

“I wonder.” Lara whispers.

She reaches out and presses the four logo pattens in the order it shows up on her map, lion, bear, snake, wolf and finally eagle. All five symbols light up glowing bight and the pillar starts to rumble. Lara takes a step back, the pillar shifts backwards and slides into the wall revealing a staircase leading into darkness.

“You’ve done it again Lara.” She smirks to herself.

Lara picks up a stick that she had cut off and wraps a bit of fabric around the end of it. She pulls out her lighter and sets the end on fire creating herself a torch and ventures into the cave.

Lara has been meaning to search this island for a while now, she’s had the island on her radar for a long time but she never got around to it. Every time Lara was about to dedicate her time to this island something else came up that needed her attention more, after about five years of distractions she has finally made it. She’s at the tomb ready to discover what is inside.

The island Lara is on is nothing too mysterious, while it was easily located on a map it spends most of its time deserted and unpopulated. Lara is interested in what lies within the island, there is nothing documented about what lays there as it all is surrounded in mystery. All that’s been documented is that there is a treasure that lies within a hidden tomb on the island. No one knows what is inside or what could happen as on one has discovered it yet.

Lara has spent the past couple of days decoding some messages and clues for the tomb, she figured the inside the tomb wont be as easy as she thinks. She knew that there was the passcode but had found hints and clues towards keys to unlock what lies inside. Though out the island Lara found a total of four keys.

“First door.” She sighs.

Lara reaches into her pocket and pulls out one of the three keys with little icons on the end of them, Lara looks up and sees that this door has a little skull on it. Lara smirks and inserts the skull key into the key hole. She turns it and hears a click, the door squeaks extremely loudly and swings open.

“I can tell that no one has been here in a long time.” Lara says walking though. “That door needs a bit of oil.”

Lara ventures into the cave more, she expects to be stopped by some traps or something but to her surprise nothing has attacked her. She steps on what feels like a pleasure plate and hears a loud creak and click causing her heart to sink. Nothing happens. She holds her torch to the wall next to her only to find a broken and rusted contraption. She takes a further look to find that a spear was supposed to come out and stab her but because it hasn’t been in use its now rusted over and stuck.

“That was close.” Lara sighs.

Lara wanders down the long corridor for what feels like a solid ten minutes and nothing has happened, no traps set off, no doors, nothing. Lara sighs but continue to venture forward, while she does feel that there may not be anything at the end she wants to see for herself and not give up on a hunch.

Lara arrives at the end only to find a small little treasure chest sitting on a solid concrete pillar. Lara hums to herself, she looks around trying to find some sort of trap around it as she knows this can’t be that easy. She looks around only to find that the pillar rests on a rusty pressure plate that looks to set off some sort of trap. Lara smirks, if this was set to be like the last trap she should be fine.

“Found the last matches.” Lara smirks seeing the two key holes on the chest.

She inserts both keys into the slot and turns them until she hears a click. Lara smiles widely as the lid of the chest slowly opens. What could the secret be that is hiding within, what mystery has been hidden for thousands of years only to be discovered now?

“A fucking necklace.” Lara sighs.

She looks at it with disappointment, she had spent a couple of years trying to find clues and whatever she can to find the great mysterious treasure only to discover its a necklace. It is a decent looking one but nothing too special, its gold with a little diamond in the centre.

Lara reaches in and takes it out with ease. She hears a little creak coming from the pillar but doesn’t think too much of it. She grips the necklace as she turns around only to find that the whole tomb is starting to shake.

“Shit.” Lara gasps.

A few rocks start to fall and Lara runs down the long corridor dodging rocks and stones as they fall. Lara feels the necklace slowly slip out of her hand so she puts it over her head for safe keeping. Lara yelps as she feels the necklace shrink a little tightening around her neck. She tries to get it off regretting what she has done but it doesn’t budge. Her body jolts but Lara keeps running trying to avoid the falling stones.

“Please no.” Lara begs seeing the exit in the distance slowly being covered by rocks.

Lara gets close and jumps diving though a small opening at the door. She lands on the ground with a hard thud and knocks herself out cold.


1. Lara wakes up later feeling completely fine
2. Lara wakes up only to find that she is in a different location
3. Lara wakes up only to find some drastic changes to her body
4. Lara wakes up and finds she is now a giant

The nude lady knew her son was approaching and soon she saw who was her short thin little boy now stood as a Godzilla sized monster to her. Jessica was scared out of her mind.

"Oh my God! My son is huge!"

As her giant son looked around for her, Jessica quickly ran away from her bathrobe and under her bed. She's amazed at how big her son is and how small she is.

"What do I do?" Jessica thought.

What does the mini mom do in regards to Tyler?
154312221.title: Mini Mom

1543122212.content:
Jessica's instincts told her that it was best for her to avoid her gigantic son.

She tried finding a place to hide under the bed.

"Where the hell is she?" Tyler said. "She was supposed to take me to the skate park."

As the thirteen was looking around for his mom, he had no idea that she was actually five inches tall and nude scampering around her room trying to be evasive.

Jessica still couldn't believe the size of her son. He was huge to her.

Suddenly Tyler turned around thinking he heard some sort of movement.

"What's that?" he asked.

Jessica waits until Tyler turns away before trying to run underneath the night stand.

What happens?
1543122212.title: Hiding from her son

154312222.content:
A DOLL'S DOLL

After she almost sells her childhood doll to a garage sale, 13 year old Megan finds herself six inches tall with her doll now as a full sized adult woman.

The roles are reversed as Megan is now the toy for her childhood doll, and the life size beauty has some fun plans in store for her former owner.
154312222.title: Another SW Scenario

choices: In a pile of her clothes on her bed
1543122221.content:
When Megan Barbella was a child, she didn't play with many toys except for one. This was her special doll, a classic edition, Blonde hair, blue eyed Lisa Lovely Doll. Very much like a barbie doll except the proportions weren't quite as ridiculous.

Megan was very shy as a child and would often play with Lisa Lovely on her own, seeing her as one of her only friends until one day she decided she wanted to become more popular, so she put away her doll and started to become much more of a beauty queen with an attitude. Dressing in nicer clothes, becoming more full of herself, and now at thirteen years of age, she had achieved a comfortable level of popularity.

Megan had curly brown hair, and a dark complexion. Many people remarked that she looked very similar to Zendaya, but in her mind, she was better than Zendaya.

One night Megan was talking on the phone with her friend, Brittany, her mom interrupted her.

"Megan! Make sure you gather up anything you don't want for the garage sale tomorrow!"

"Ugh, fine mom!" Megan said. "I gotta go Britt, Mom's making me do stupid things."

Megan went to fill up a box with old clothes and knick knacks and then she found her old Lisa Lovely doll. She looked at the blonde doll for a quick second before realizing that she was too old.

"Eh, you can go. I don't need you anymore." After Megan put the barbie sized doll in the box, she got in her pajamas and went to bed. Little did Megan know, but her doll was going to change severely and so was she...

The next morning, Megan woke up...
1543122221.title: A Doll's Doll

15431222213.content:
Megan slowly woke up, she had a massive head ache and could barely remember the light before.

"Ugh, what happened?" Soon, Megan felt herself on a soft pale surface, almost flesh like. "What the hell is this?" Megan rubbed her eyes, and looked up at something that was casting a massive shadow over her.

It was the face of a gorgeous blue eyed blonde woman in her early thirties, she looked almost like Margot Robbie. She had a killer body with a perfect figure with boobs and ass. She wore a long blue dress and had bright red lipstick.

"Hello Megan, glad to see you woke up?"

"Who... who are you? And why am I small?" Megan said scared.

"Oh you poor thing, I guess we simply traded fates. I became a human and meanwhile all of my smallness was transferred to you."

Megan put everything together.

"Lisa? Is that you?"

"Bingo, Megan. How clever." She booped Megan on her tiny nose. "Lisa Lovely is now Life Size, isn't it great. I look so much hotter in a human body than I do as a plastic little bimbo." Lisa admired her shapely figure in a mirror.

"Hello!!" Megan said from Lisa's palm. "Lisa, you have to help me! You gotta make me big again."

Lisa closed her fist around the five inch tall thirteen year old.

"Listen shrimp, I don't gotta do anything. You were going to give me away like I was nothing. You were gonna forget about me. Well now I get to call the shots, and you my little light brown cutie, get to be my doll. How about that, teeny?"

Megan was horrified her childhood doll was now human sized while she was no bigger than a five inch doll. What does Lisa say to Megan next?
15431222213.title: In the hands of a former doll

154312222131.content:
"You know what Megan, I think that we should spend some more quality time together. Oh! I know, let's go shopping!"

Megan was floored. "I don't wanna go shopping I wanna be big again!"

"Oh quit your whining, it'll be fun. You're not gonna be big for a while so you might as well have fun with me."

Megan pouted as she was enclosed in Lisa's hand.

"Awww, how cute?" Lisa said. Lisa gently patted Megan's head. "Don't worry, hon, we're gonna have a blast. Now I just gotta put you somewhere."

"You're not taking me anywhere, you're going to go downstairs and find my mom, and fix this."

"Megan sweetie, I told you I don't know how to fix this, so please just let your old doll have some fun." Lisa lightly booped Megan on her nose. "Ah here we go!"

Lisa looked down and found Megan's purse.

"Cute purse."

"You can't use that! That's mine."

Lisa smiled. "It's mine now, Megan, don't worry I'll keep you safe." With that Lisa unzipped the purse and dropped Megan inside.

"Sit tight, babe." Lisa said with a wink before zipping up the purse.

"You let me out of here you giant bitch!" The thirteen year old girl pouted wondering how she was gonna get out of this situation."

After avoiding the eyes of Megan's mother and brothers, Lisa took a cab to the mall.

Once she stepped inside of the "Oaks Corner Mall", she pulled out Megan from the purse.

"See? That wasn't so bad, was it?"

"I'm not talking to you," Megan said pissed off.

"Aww come on, Megan, don't be like that. We've got shopping to do."

Where do Lisa and Megan go first?
154312222131.title: We're going shopping!
